title: New: FAMY – Friends Home
body:
London three piece **FAMY** have just released their third single from their debut album _WE FAM ECONO_ (due on the 8th of september) and it’s bloody lovely.

_Friends Home_ may struggle to escape the Coldplay comparisons, but that doesn’t stop the track being a beautifully composed four minutes that’s plentiful in emotion and gorgeous melody. Having already been premiered by Zane Lowe on BBCR1, **FAMY** are surely destined for mainstream success, their enormous pop driven sound perfect for both the road and the airwaves. Stream it below and see what I mean:
